content_w:
最近的領悟是~~

不管是工作執行上，還是出國旅遊&amp

work...英文真的很重要，

前些日子畫完老四川尾牙，接著畫XX髮品亞洲區經理，

"染眉膏"英文聽不懂，被取笑了....

high class嗎? 哼哼哼.....睡前背單字去(突然被刺激到了" 上進了起來~

pingi 這回把髮妝產品相關的單字大大蒐集

統整了一番，

在周年慶上搶夯貨也超實用的 ，哈哈哈哈!!

說法很多種，以下供大家參考囉

@護膚/保養 Skin Care 青春痘(用品)：Acne/Spot (Applicators/Accessories) 活化用，賦活用：Active 日曬後用品：After Sun 無酒精：Alcohol-free 抗、防：Anti- 抗、防皺紋：Anti-wrinkle 平衡酸鹼：Balancing 清潔用：Clean-/Purify- 臉部用：Facial 眼部用：Eye - 唇用：Lip - 快乾：Fast/Quick dry 緊膚：Firm 溫和用：Gentle 保濕用：Hydra- 持久性：Long lasting 多元：Mult- 滋養：Nutritious 控油：Oil-control 剝撕式(面膜)：Pack 敷面剝落式(面膜)：Peeling 去除、卸妝：Remover 修護：Repair 活化：Revitalite 溶解：Solvent 防曬用：Sun Block 防水：Waterproof 美白：Whitening 明亮：Brightening

混合性(肌膚)：Combination 乾性(肌膚)：Dry 油性(肌膚)：Oily 中性/一般性(肌膚)：Normal 敏感性(肌膚)：Sensitive

乳：Milk 泡沫：Foam 凝膠：Gel 霜：Cream 精華液：Essence 保濕/潤膚(劑)：Moisturizer 噴霧：Spray/Mist 化妝水/液/露：Lotion (某些產品會直接用lotion來稱呼乳液)

眼膠：Eye Gel 洗面(泡/乳/霜/凝膠)：Facial Cleanser/Face Wash(Foam,Milky,Cream,Gel) 爽膚水：Toner/Astringent 緊膚水：Firming Lotion 柔膚水：Toner/Smoothing Toner （Facial Mist/Facial Spray/Complexion Mist）

淨膚化妝水：Clear Lotion 亮白化妝水：Whitening Lotion 明亮白皙化妝水：Ultra-brightening Whitening Lotion 煥采化妝水：Refreshing Lotion

日霜：Day Cream 晚霜：Night Cream 護膚霜：Moisturizers and Creams 抗皺霜：Anti-Wrinkle Cream 喚膚/修護霜：Skin Recovery Cream 抗老潤膚(霜 / 凝膠 / 乳液)：Anti-aging Moisturizer 活化眼霜：Activate Eye Cream 肌膚活力精華(霜 / 凝膠 / 乳液)：Activate Skin Builder 明亮潤膚凝膠：Brightening Moisturizing Gel 明亮潤膚乳液：Brightening Moisturizing Emulsion T字部位平衡凝膠：T-Zone Balancing Gel 賦活眼(霜 / 凝膠 / 乳液)：Eye Revitalizer 眼部抗浮腫 / 黑眼圈專用(霜 / 凝膠 / 乳液)：Eye Soother Anti-puffiness / Dark Circles

面膜：Facial Mask/Masque 眼膜：Eye Mask 深度白淨面膜：Intensive Whitening Mask 護唇用：Lip Care 口紅護膜：Lip Coat 身體去角質膏：Body Scrub 臉部磨砂膏：Facial Scrub 去角質磨砂膏：Exfoliating Scrub 去黑頭粉刺：(Deep) Pore Cleanser/Striper Pore Refining 去死皮：Exfoliating Scrub 身體潤膚露：Body Lotion/Moisturizer 護手液：Hand Lotion/Moisturizer 溫和洗面乳(皂)：Gentle Cleansing Lotion

Gentle Cleansing Foam

Gentle Cleansing Soap 溫和洗面霜：Gentle Cleansing Cream 按摩霜：Massage Cream 洗手乳：Hand Cleanser 沐浴凝膠：Shower Gel 沐浴按摩油：Bath and Massage Oil 沐浴露：Body Wash 泡泡浴凝膠：Bouncing Bubbles 身體噴霧：Body Spray/ Body Splash 身體保養：Body Care 身體霜：Body Cream 身體乳霜(油)：Body Butter 身體保濕乳液：Body Moisturing Lotion 身體乳液：Body Lotion

@化妝品器具 Cosmetic Applicators/Accessories 彩妝：Cosmetics 粉刷：Cosmetic Brush/ Face Brush 蜜粉刷：Powder Brush 粉撲：Powder Puffs 海綿撲：Sponge Puffs 眉刷：Brow Brush 睫毛夾：Lash Curler/Eyelash Curler 眉毛&amp

睫毛刷：Brow &amp

Lash Comb 眼影刷：Eye Shadow Brush/Shadow Applicator 雙頭的眼線刷：Double-ended Eyelining Brush 口紅刷：Lip Brush 腮紅刷：Blush Brush 可伸縮的腮紅刷：Retractable Blush Brush 削筆機：Pencil Sharpener (眉筆

唇筆

眼線筆

眼唇筆…..) 刷具清潔液(洗刷水)：Brush Cleaner 電動剃毛器：Electric Shaver(for women) 電動睫毛卷：Electric Lash Curler 描眉卡：Brow Template 紙巾：Facial Tissue 吸油紙：Oil-Absorbing Sheets 化妝棉：Cotton Pads 棉籤：Q-tips 化妝包：Cosmetic Bag 旅行組：Travel Pack 妝前乳：Makeup Base 隔離霜/防曬：Sun Screen/Sun Block 飾底乳 / 霜(遮瑕膏 / 霜)：Sensual Skin Enhancer

Sensual Skin Primer

Time Balm Concealer

Corrector Concealer 遮瑕膏：Concealer 睫毛膏：Mascara 染眉膏(眉廓定色膠)：Brow Set/Eyebrow Mascara 修容餅：Shading powder 粉底：Foundation (Compact/Stick) 粉凝霜：Cream-to-Powder Foundation 潤色增亮粉餅：Brightening Powder Foundation 蜜粉餅：Pressed Powder 粉餅：Pressed Powder (如果有註明”refill”代表可替換粉芯) 鬆粉：Loose Powder 閃粉：Shimmering Powder/Glitter 珠光效果的蜜粉：Glistening Powder 眉粉：Brow Powder 眉筆：Brow Pencil/Eyebrow Pencil 眼線筆：Eye Liner Pencil 眼線液：Liquid Eye Liner 眼影：Eye Shadow 單色眼影：Single Eye Shadow 雙色眼影：Eye Shadow Duo 三色眼影：Trio Eye Shadow 超長睫毛膏：Exaggeration Lengthening Mascara 睫毛增強睫毛膏：Lashes Intensifying Mascara 捲俏睫毛膏：Curling Mascara 唇線筆：Lip Liner 眼唇筆：Eye &amp

Lip Pencil 唇膏(口紅)：Lip Color/Lipstick/Rouge（筆狀Lip Pencil，棒狀Lip Stick，盒或盤裝Lip Color/Lip Gloss） 薄透水潤脣膏：Strictly Sheer Moisturizing Lipstick 超亮澤脣膏：Pure Reflection Ultra-Shine Lipstick 保濕珠光脣膏：Wet Pearl Lipstick 超水感脣蜜：outh-Watering Lip Gloss 唇彩(唇蜜)：Lip Gloss/Lip Color/Lacquer / Luster 兩端都有的脣蜜：Double-Ended Lip Gloss 唇亮油：Shine Lip Lacquer

Lip Shine

Lip Polish 護脣膏：Plump Your Pucker Lip Plumper

Plump Lip Enhancer

Lip Plumper

Lip Balm

Soothing Lip Buffer 唇彩盤：Lip Kit

Lip Palette 腮紅(壓縮粉狀)：Blush/ Blush Powder 腮紅(含保濕霜固體狀)：Cream Blush

Creamy Moist Glow 彩妝盤(通常都包含了唇彩,眼影,腮紅等刷具組)：Makeup Disk

Face Kit

Face Paint Palette 用在身上的小亮片/彩妝品：Body Art 香水(香氛)：Perfume/Fragrance/Parfum Spray 卸妝產品：Makeup Remover 卸妝水：Makeup Remover 卸妝乳：Makeup Removing Lotion 100%無油性眼部卸妝(油/液/乳)：100% Oil-free Eye Makeup Remover 溫和眼部卸妝(油/液/乳)：Gentle Eye Makeup Remover 快速眼唇卸妝(油/液/乳)：Instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover

@美甲護理 manicure/pedicure 指甲上色：coloring 指甲彩繪：Nail Art / Paint Art 指甲油：nail polish/color/enamel 去光水：nail polish remover 護甲液：Nail saver 腿部保養：Foot Care 腿部去角質霜：Foot Scrub 腳部挫刀: Foot File 腿霜：Foot Cream 美化腳指甲護理：Pretty Pedicure 腳指甲透明光療：Clear Gel 單色光療：Color Gel 漸層光療：Gradation 璀璨光療：Glitter Gel　 法式指甲：French Nail 延甲光療：Extension 各式美甲卸甲：Remove 透明水晶指甲：Crystal Clear Nail 璀璨水晶指甲：Glitter Crystal Nails　 法式水晶指甲：french crystal nail　　 手部基礎保養：Basic Manicure　 手部深層保養：Deluxe Manicure　 足部基礎保養：Basic Pedicure　 足部深層保養：Deluxe Pedicure　 腳後跟龜裂護理：Cracked Heel Treatment

@頭髮護理 Hair Care 洗髮精：Shampoo 潤髮乳：Conditioner 慕絲：Mousse 光澤洗髮精：Glossing Shampoo 光澤潤髮乳：Glossing Conditioner 捲髮用洗髮精：Curls Shampoo 捲髮用潤髮乳：Curls Conditioner 滋養洗髮精(乾性/受損髮質適用)：Nourishing Shampoo for dry/damaged hair 光澤洗髮精(正常髮質適用)：Shine Shampoo for formal 均衡洗髮精(正常髮質適用)：Balancing Shampoo for formal 專業用洗髮精：Technician Shampoo 專業用潤髮乳：Technician Conditioner 專業用護色髮膜：Technician Color Care Mask

@美髮造型器具 Hair Products/Accessories 護髮素：Hair Conditioner 髮膠：Styling Gel 染髮：Hair Color 冷燙水：Perm/Perming Formula 捲髮器：Rollers/Perm Rollers 造型產品：Styling Products 造型亮澤霜：Style Glossing Cream 造型捲髮噴霧/噴膠/定型液：Curls Wave Creating Spray 加強捲度造型膠：Curl Enhancing Gel 梳子：Hair Brush

Comb 日曬防護：Sun Protection 防曬乳：Sun Block

Sunscreen Lotion 防曬噴霧：Sunscreen Spray

以上是pingi花了點時間整理出來的，

自己也趁機複習了幾遍呢，啊哈~

有興趣的水水們趕快跟pingi一起來充充電吧~

當然，如果有缺漏錯誤歡迎跟pingi說一下唷!!

&lt

&lt

圖片來源:網路&gt

title: 化妝品/中英對照/Makeup/Cosmetic單字集/英文實用帖/翻譯 @ pingi's 彩妝造型blog/新祕課程/make-up & style studio :: 痞客邦 ::

不管是工作執行上，還是出國旅遊&amp

前些日子畫完老四川尾牙，接著畫XX髮品亞洲區經理，

"染眉膏"英文聽不懂，被取笑了....

@美甲護理 manicure/pedicure 指甲上色：coloring 指甲彩繪：Nail Art / Paint Art 指甲油：nail polish/color/enamel 去光水：nail polish remover 護甲液：Nail saver 腿部保養：Foot Care 腿部去角質霜：Foot Scrub 腳部挫刀: Foot File 腿霜：Foot Cream 美化腳指甲護理：Pretty Pedicure 腳指甲透明光療：Clear Gel 單色光療：Color Gel 漸層光療：Gradation 璀璨光療：Glitter Gel　 法式指甲：French Nail 延甲光療：Extension 各式美甲卸甲：Remove 透明水晶指甲：Crystal Clear Nail 璀璨水晶指甲：Glitter Crystal Nails　 法式水晶指甲：french crystal nail　　 手部基礎保養：Basic Manicure　 手部深層保養：Deluxe Manicure　 足部基礎保養：Basic Pedicure　 足部深層保養：Deluxe Pedicure　 腳後跟龜裂護理：Cracked Heel Treatment
